articles.title: India’s moon rover completes walk, put into ‘sleep mode’ - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: The rover’s payloads are turned off and data it collected has been transmitted to Earth, India’s space agency says.
articles.content:
Indias moon rover has been switched off after completing its walk on the lunar surface two weeks after its historic landing near the lunar south pole, the countrys space agency has said.
